reviews.review:
What more can be said about this masterpiece? Believe it or not, I actually played this and all of the other Half Life 2 installments YEARS ago on my Xbox 360 version of The Orange Box. It was a gift from my uncle, unfortunately he has since passed. Although this happened a few months ago, I finally decided to splurge a little and buy the games for PC in his honor. After years of waiting and bad timing, I figured to just ignore the summer sales, I can get other Valve games then. I need those assets for GMOD!

Jesus, replaying this has been a trip. So many can do a perfect job of explaining what is so amazing about this game, and all of their personal experiences with it, so I will not, However, one thing I can say with absolute certainty is that I eagerly await the release of the next Half-Life installment, whether it be the final or not. After reading the Laidlaw script and watching playthroughs of Half-Life: Alyx (I cannot afford a VR headset), I am immeasurably excited for the outcome of the next game. Well dome, Valve, but try not to keep us waiting!! :)

Every bit as good as the original Half-Life 2.

And the second part of the biggest joke in gaming history.
it's fucking half life 2 ep 2. play it.

Short and sweet but delivers gameplay that's on par with the best sequences of half Life 2 with a raised bar in terms of graphics. I highly recommend this to enjoyers of sci-fi horror and action adventure fps games.
Made me so depressed that I didn't play this game for 7 years. 12/5/14

Ending is a real cliffhanger. Don't get this if you expect the series to continue. It hasn't. It's like a great mystery novel only to have the last page torn out. Watch out for the cliffhangers - you might be walked off the edge.

F por el padre de Alyx xd

What a phenomenal series of games. 100% worth your time. Even if you not that big on shooters, the characters, story and environments definitely make up for it.

Well i don't think i have to continue, the game is a masterpiece.
Great continuation of the story, some challenging fights, and the characters are still the same as always. to me, its a 10/10.

This is an incredible sequel to hl 2 ep 1, its even better. It's more half life 2 and expands the story even more, it continues right where hl 2 ep 1 left off and its so good. This will probably be the conclusion to the story etc, now im going to play the prequel, half life alyx, which will hopefully expand the story even more. Just sad that the end of this episode will probably undeniably be the end of the storyline.
just finish it if you already finished hl2,episode 1

Another fantastic story in the Half-Life universe, which carries on from Episode 1 and the main Half-Life 2 game.
This one is a bit longer than episode 1, and it's just as good and gripping, with a mother of a cliffhanger ending!
So much improvement from episode 1, Definitely worth it if you played episode 1. Ending was Beautiful.
Oh boy, that was one fun game, I can't wait to see what happens next in Episode 3.

Fantastic game, on par with Half Life 2. Antlion caves could have been shortened a bit but Griggs and Sheckly made it worth it. Still havent finished gnome run but im tryin. Overall good game.
